675390.name: Castle of Shikigami - Evolution
675390.description:
Welcome to the next level of Castle of Shikigami...

Shikigami is back, more aggressive and more challenging than ever before.
Can you hold out against this new onslaught of ruthless foes? You'll need all your wits about you to solve this case!
Castle of Shikigami brought about a revolution for shooting games when it was released and this is the director's cut.

Contents


This DLC adds a new mode: "Evolution" to Castle of Shikigami
  • A complete overhaul for standard enemy spawn points, attack patterns and numbers!
  • Mid and stage bosses have been powered-up far in excess of their counterparts in the normal game
  • Whether its completion or a high score, your abilities will be tested anew!
  • New leaderboards and achievements
675390.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
